title: Input Lag and general stuttering since patch 7.3
body:
Hey, whenever I join a game I have temporary performance issues. While having a constant 30 ping. For example whenever I just command my champion to walk down the lane he seems to slow down ocasionally. Much like I would experience packet loss, which I do not. Additional issues are slightly teleporting champions or minions as well as input lag when issuing point and click spells. All of these Issues sound like I have packet loss, I know but i double checked it already everything else runs fine.
I hope someone can help me.

Thanks!

This sounds like an unstable connection failing to hold strong comms with the game server, so something like packet loss might be causing input delays.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your specific issue.  Let me know what you find.

That's strange to hear, but thanks for double checking.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a closer look at this.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some additional logs for context as well.  We'll take a look and reply back as soon as we can.

Disable your g-sync. Fixes the issue.
